thread.section_title: MAXBACK Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of MAXBACK | www.maxback.com | 2 of 49
thread.title: Patricia Lange

author: Patricia Lange
title: Patricia Lange
text:
I read about MaxBack and tried it out selling my Apple Watch, which was in great condition and they offered a very fair price. When they received the watch, they quickly wrote back saying that they priced it out based on a different model (I put in the wrong band...totally my fault) and they did lower the offer (still very good) and gave me the option to accept it or not.
Overall the experience was great, the speed of the entire process was very fast and I look forward to using them again!
